NK040(thi)055:1: // zab mo gcod kyi bskyed bzlas dang phung po mchod
NK040(thi)055:2: sbyin tshogs mchod bcas bdud rtsi'i char rgyun zhes bya
NK040(thi)055:3: ba bzhugs so // na mo gu ru d+he wa d+aak+ki ni h'u /
NK040(thi)055:4: chos sku yum chen mkha' khyab yongs pa'i klong //
NK040(thi)055:5: longs sku sgrol ma'i yangs khyab sprin phung 'khrigs //
NK040(thi)055:6: sprul sku lab sgron kun khyab thugs rje'i char //
NK040(thi)055:7: 'gro kun rgyud smin drin mo che la 'dud //
NK040(thi)055:8: ma cig thugs rje'i mkha' klong las byung ba'i //
NK040(thi)055:9: gcod yul gyi nyams len man ngag dpag tu med pa zhig 'dug kyang //
NK040(thi)055:11: de yang phyi 'jig rten 'khor ba'i chag zhen gyi 'khri ba btsan thabs su gcod cing /
NK040(thi)055:12: zhen med ri khrod 'grim pa dang gcig /
NK040(thi)055:13: nang sgyu lus kyi phung po gces 'dzin gyi 'ching ba btsan thabs su gcod cing /
NK040(thi)055:14: chags med mchod sbyin du btang ba dang gnyis /
NK040(thi)055:15: gsang ba gnyis 'dzin gyi lha 'dre'i 'jig skrag btsan thabs su gcod cing /
NK040(thi)055:16: gnyis med sgyu ma'i lam du khyer ba dang gsum mo //
NK040(thi)055:17: dang po man ngag las shes shing /
NK040(thi)055:18: gnyis pa phung po mchod sbyin 'di ltar ro //
NK040(thi)055:19: thog mar blo ldog rnam bzhis rgyud sbyangs /
NK040(thi)055:20: de nas mgron bsdu ba'i klong gsal snying po'i gsung las /
NK040(thi)055:21: phatah rang nyid rje btsun ma dmar mo g.yas pas mi lpags kyi g.yang gzhi bsnams zhing /
NK040(thi)055:22: g.yon pas mi rkang gi gling bu 'bud pa /
NK040(thi)055:23: phatah ho gtso bo'i gdon chen bco brgyad /
NK040(thi)055:24: byis pa'i gdon chen bco lnga /
NK040(thi)055:29: mtho srid pa'i rtse mo man chad /
NK040(thi)055:30: dma' na rag dmyal khams yan chad snang zhing srid pa'i lha 'dre thams cad tshur 'dus shig /
NK040(thi)055:31: phatah de ltar 'dus pa'i lha 'dre thams cad bdag la nyon cig /
NK040(thi)055:32: khyed rnams las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang du gyur pa yin pas /
NK040(thi)055:33: bdag gis khyed rnams la zab mo chos kyi 'brel ba byed /
NK040(thi)055:34: dam pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas /
NK040(thi)055:35: rnam mkhyen sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'god pa yin pas /
NK040(thi)055:36: yid gus pa dang ldan pas nyon la bdag gis phrin las sgrub shig /
NK040(thi)055:38: phata phatah phatah rigs drug sems can snang srid lha 'dre kun //
NK040(thi)055:39: thog ma med nas drin chen pha ma ste //
NK040(thi)055:40: de ltar ma shes lha dang 'dre ru 'dzin //
NK040(thi)055:41: gnod bya gnod byed gnyis 'dzin rgyun chad med //
NK040(thi)055:42: da ni ma dang bu yis 'du shes kyis //
NK040(thi)055:43: bdag gi zag bcas phung po drin du 'bul //
NK040(thi)055:44: zag med dge ba byang chub rgyu ru bsngo //
NK040(thi)055:45: rnam mkhyen sangs rgyas sa ru 'god par bya //
NK040(thi)055:46: phata phatah ma rig gnyis 'dzin 'khrul pa'i lha 'dre rnams //
NK040(thi)055:47: gnyis med ye shes byang chub ma thob bar //
NK040(thi)055:48: skyabs gnas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
NK040(thi)055:49: a ma lab kyi sgron mas thugs rjes zungs //
NK040(thi)055:50: 'gro ba'i mgon po rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK040(thi)055:51: bdag gzhan lus dang longs spyod mchod pa 'bul //
NK040(thi)055:52: dge la yi rang mi dge sdig pa bshags //
NK040(thi)055:53: mya ngan mi 'da' chos 'khor bskor du gsol //
NK040(thi)055:54: 'gro drug sems can sangs rgyas thob par shog /
NK040(thi)055:55: phata phatah mdun gyi nam mkha' 'ja' 'od 'khrigs pa'i dbus //
NK040(thi)055:56: seng khri pad zla nyi ma'i gdan stengs su //
NK040(thi)055:57: rgyal ba'i yum mchog lab kyi sgron ma'i sku //
NK040(thi)055:58: dkar gsal spyan gsum nam mkha'i mthong la gzigs //
NK040(thi)055:59: g.yas pas da ru g.yon pas dril bu 'khrol //
NK040(thi)055:60: zhabs gnyis gar stabs rol pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs //
NK040(thi)055:61: ma cig spyi bor pad nyi zla ba'i steng //
NK040(thi)055:62: chos sku yum chen gser mdog phyag bzhi ma //
NK040(thi)055:63: g.yas gnyis gser rdor rtse lnga ral gri dang //
NK040(thi)055:64: g.yon gnyis mnyam bzhag sher phyin glegs bam bsnams //
NK040(thi)055:65: zhabs gnyis skyil krung dar dang rin chen rgyan //
NK040(thi)055:66: gtso mo'i g.yas su ston pa sh+aakya thub //
NK040(thi)055:67: g.yon du 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng+ge dang //
NK040(thi)055:68: mtha' bskor grub thob gcod yul brgyud pa'i gtsos //
NK040(thi)055:69: bla ma yi dam sangs rgyas byang sems tshogs //
NK040(thi)055:70: rin chen dpa' bo mkha' 'gro 'bum gyis bskor //
NK040(thi)055:72: rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs gnyis med gyur //
NK040(thi)055:73: stong gsum rab 'byams 'jig rten khams kun gyi //
NK040(thi)055:74: 'don yon lnga yi mchod sprin rgya mtsho 'bul //
NK040(thi)055:75: thugs rje'i brtse ba chen po'i bzhes su gsol //
NK040(thi)055:76: phatah phatah bdag lus stong gsum man+dala lhun gyis grub //
NK040(thi)055:77: rnam shes tshogs brgyad gsal ba'i tshom bur bkod //
NK040(thi)055:78: sems nyid rang gsal mdzes pa'i nyi zlas brgyan //
NK040(thi)055:79: phyi nang gsang ba'i man+dala rgya chen 'di //
NK040(thi)055:80: ma cig rin chen grub thob rgya mtsho la //
NK040(thi)055:81: gus pas 'bul lo thugs rjes bzhes su gsol //
NK040(thi)055:82: phatah ma cig yum chen dkyil 'khor lha tshogs kyi //
NK040(thi)055:83: thugs kar thugs srog sa bon sngags kyis bskor //
NK040(thi)055:84: bzlas pas 'khor ba'i 'od kyis rgyal ba mchod //
NK040(thi)055:85: byin rlabs tshur bsdus lha tshogs sngags phreng las //
NK040(thi)055:86: zag med ye shes bdud rtsi'i char bab nas //
NK040(thi)055:87: lha 'dre'i gtso byas khams gsum 'gro la phog /
NK040(thi)055:88: las nyon sdig sgrib sdug bsngal kun sbyang bsam /
NK040(thi)055:89: +aahmh'u bam gu ru d+he wa d+aak+ki ni ha ri ni sa sid+d+hi h'u /
NK040(thi)055:92: stong nyid mtha' dang bral ba nam mkha'i ngang /
NK040(thi)055:93: skye med chos sku lab kyi sgron ma la //
NK040(thi)055:94: gsol ba 'debs so bdag rgyud smin pa dang //
NK040(thi)055:95: bdag med chos skur grol bar byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)055:96: ma 'gags rol pa mkhyen brtse'i ye shes shar //
NK040(thi)055:97: 'gags med longs sku lab kyi sgron ma la //
NK040(thi)055:98: gsol ba bdag med gang 'dul thabs kyis 'gro kun srid mtsho sgrol //
NK040(thi)055:99: thugs rje sprul sku lab kyi sgron ma la //
NK040(thi)055:100: gsol ba bdag med ma cig thugs rje las byung byin rlabs can //
NK040(thi)055:101: gcod yul 'dzin pa'i skyes mchog thabs cad la //
NK040(thi)055:102: gsol ba bdag med byin rlabs gnyis stsol dngos grub char rgyun 'bebs //
NK040(thi)055:103: yi dam zhi khro mkha' 'gro chos skyong la //
NK040(thi)055:104: gsol ba bdag med nga med ngar 'dzin a 'thas 'khrul pa 'di //
NK040(thi)055:105: gtad med rgya yan ngang du bshig tu gsol //
NK040(thi)055:106: bdag med gces 'dzin sgyu lus phung po 'di //
NK040(thi)055:107: zhen med sgyu ma'i ngang du sbyang du gsol //
NK040(thi)055:109: gnyis med stong nyid ngang du sbyang du gsol //
NK040(thi)055:110: rang sems ma bcos thig le nyag cig 'di //
NK040(thi)055:111: ma cig thugs rjes mkha' klong yangs par 'pho //
NK040(thi)055:112: phata phatah slar yang skye med chos dbyings ngang nyid las //
NK040(thi)055:113: rang sems rdo rje rnal 'byor ma ru shar //
NK040(thi)055:114: rang gi thod pa b+han+d+ha stong gsum khyon //
NK040(thi)055:115: sha khrag rus pa zag med bdud rtsi lnga //
NK040(thi)055:116: 'dod yon lnga ldan 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro //
NK040(thi)055:117: kun bzang mchod sprin nam mkha'i mtha' klas bkang //
NK040(thi)055:118: skyabs gnas dam pa bla ma dkon mchog gsum //
NK040(thi)055:119: yi dam zhi khro mkha' 'gro chos skyong la //
NK040(thi)055:120: mchod pa 'bul lo tshogs gnyis rdzogs gyur cig /
NK040(thi)055:121: phata phatah bdag lus lpags pa gser gyi sa gzhi'i steng //
NK040(thi)055:122: zag bcas phung po 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga //
NK040(thi)055:123: rgyal srid sna bdun 'dod yon phun sum tshogs //
NK040(thi)055:124: ma tshang med pa'i 'dod rdzas mkho dgu ldan //
NK040(thi)055:125: mi mjed bdag po gtsang ris mgon po sogs //
NK040(thi)055:126: arga dkar po'i mnga' bdag rnams la 'bul //
NK040(thi)055:127: dga' mgu yi rang byang chub sems ldan zhing //
NK040(thi)055:128: rnam mkhyen rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par shog /
NK040(thi)055:129: phata phatah bdag lus zag bcas gzugs kyi phung po 'di //
NK040(thi)055:130: dkar gsum mngar gsum 'o ma'i rgya mtsho dang //
NK040(thi)055:131: rta dang ba glang dkor nor ljon pa'i shing //
NK040(thi)055:132: so so rang rang 'dod rdzas mkho dgur ldan //
NK040(thi)055:133: gnyen khrod 'di dang 'jig rten khams kun gyi //
NK040(thi)055:134: lha dang sa bdag zo dor rnams la 'bul //
NK040(thi)055:135: dga' mgu yi rangs byang chub sems ldan zhing //
NK040(thi)055:136: rnam mkhyen rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par shog /
NK040(thi)055:137: phata phatah bdag lus phung po yon tan kun dang ldan //
NK040(thi)055:138: gang la gang dgos ci la ci 'dod pa'i //
NK040(thi)055:139: 'bad med so so'i 'dod rdzas phun sum tshogs //
NK040(thi)055:140: rigs drug 'khor ba'i sems can rnams la 'bul //
NK040(thi)055:141: bkres pa'i zas dang na ba'i sman mchog dang //
NK040(thi)055:142: 'jigs pa'i skyabs dang brten pa'i gnas gyur te //
NK040(thi)055:143: sdug bsngal zhi zhing tshogs gnyis rab rdzogs nas //
NK040(thi)055:144: rnam mkhyen rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par shog /
NK040(thi)055:145: phata phatah bdag lus g.yang gzhi stong gsum tshad du grub //
NK040(thi)055:146: sha yi ri bo khrag gi rgya mtsho dang //
NK040(thi)055:147: sla ba rus pa'i gram khrod chen por gyur //
NK040(thi)055:148: srid pa'i rtse man na rag dmyal khams yan //
NK040(thi)055:149: dug gsum las byung snang srid lha 'dre'i tshogs //
NK040(thi)055:150: pho gdon rgyal po mo gdon srin mo dang //
NK040(thi)055:151: klu gdon sa bdag nad dang yam gyi bdag /
NK040(thi)055:152: stong phrag brgyad bcu'i bgegs kyi tshogs rnams kun //
NK040(thi)055:153: gti mug sha yi ri la tshim par zo //
NK040(thi)055:154: 'dod chags khrag gi mtsho la ngom par 'thung //
NK040(thi)055:155: zhe sdang sla ba rus pa rngam par rol //
NK040(thi)055:156: dga' mgu yi rang byang chub sems ldan zhing //
NK040(thi)055:157: rnam mkhyen rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par shog /
NK040(thi)055:158: phata phatah sngon chad ma sleb da lta glo bur gyis //
NK040(thi)055:159: lhag pa'i 'byung po khas zhan dbang chung ba //
NK040(thi)055:160: zha long 'on lkug tshogs rnams tshim gyur cig /
NK040(thi)055:161: ye shes spyan ldan rdzu 'phrul rkang pa ldan //
NK040(thi)055:162: chos kyi sgra thos tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan zhing //
NK040(thi)055:163: rnam mkhyen rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myur thob shog /
NK040(thi)055:164: de nas bde sdug gtong len gyi dmigs pa nan tan dang chos sbyin bya'o //
NK040(thi)055:166: zab mo gcod kyi tshogs mchod bsdus pa grub gnyis kyi sa bon bzhugs /
NK040(thi)055:167: rlung me thod sgyed la gnas ka p+aa lar //
NK040(thi)055:168: tshogs kyi yo byad dam rdzas kun tshang zhing //
NK040(thi)055:169: rang rig mkha' 'gro rang lus tshogs dang 'dre //
NK040(thi)055:170: phata phatah phata phatah sha rus khrag gis phyur bur gtam pa la /
NK040(thi)055:171: ram yam kham spros ma dag dngos 'dzin sbyang //
NK040(thi)055:172: rdzas zhu rlangs pa zla dkyil rdo rje phyed //
NK040(thi)055:173: rwa la rigs lnga'i snying po bcu gsal ba'i //
NK040(thi)055:174: 'od zer gyis bskul 'khor 'das bdud rtsi bkug /
NK040(thi)055:175: yas rim gyis zhu thod pa'i bdud rtsir 'dres //
NK040(thi)055:177: gnas rang bzhin rnam dag pho brang nas //
NK040(thi)055:178: khyed skyabs gnas mchog dang snying rje'i mgron //
NK040(thi)055:180: tshogs kyi mchod pa 'di bzhes la //
NK040(thi)055:181: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub stsol //
NK040(thi)055:182: byin rlabs thugs rje rgyun ma chad //
NK040(thi)055:183: phyi nang gnyis kyi bar chad sol //
NK040(thi)055:184: ma h+aa su kha sa ma ya ho /
NK040(thi)055:185: g+ha na tsakra p+auts+tsha kha kha kh+aa hi /
NK040(thi)055:187: zhal zas tshogs gtor 'di bsngosa pas //
NK040(thi)055:188: bsngosa pa bzhin du tshim gyur cig /
NK040(thi)055:189: bsam pa bzhin du 'grub gyur cig /
NK040(thi)055:191: h'u h+r+aih rdo rje khros ma'i bka' nyan las byed tshogs //
NK040(thi)055:192: bka' yi pha 'bab lhag gtor 'di bzhes la //
NK040(thi)055:193: zhi rgyas dbang drag 'gugs 'dren mnan gzir sogs //
NK040(thi)055:194: ji ltar bcol pa'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod //
NK040(thi)055:195: ces pa'ang bka' ma'i don bsdus nas snying sdug gi
NK040(thi)055:196: bu rat+nasa bskul ngor bi dza'i ming gis bris pa
NK040(thi)055:197: mchog thun bde glag tu 'grub pa'i rgyu gyur cig
NK040(thi)055:198: / de nas sa bcad gsum pa lha 'dre gnyis
NK040(thi)055:199: 'dzin gyi 'khri ba btsan thabs su gcod pa'i phyir
NK040(thi)055:200: gnyis med sgyu ma lam du khyer ba ni /
NK040(thi)055:201: phata phatah rang sems 'gyu ba dngos med cho 'phrul las //
NK040(thi)055:202: de las ma gtogs lha 'dre logs su med //
NK040(thi)055:203: nga dang khyed med gnod bya gnod byed med //
NK040(thi)055:204: lha 'dre gnyis med 'jigs dang 'jigs yul med //
NK040(thi)055:205: bzang ngan gnyis med bde dang sdug bsngal med //
NK040(thi)055:206: 'khor 'das gnyis med re dang dog pa med //
NK040(thi)055:207: thams cad ro snyoms yum chen chos sku'i klong //
NK040(thi)055:209: bdag lus zag bcas phung po'i mchod sbyin 'dis //
NK040(thi)055:210: bla ma dam pa'i thugs dgongs rdzogs gyur cig /
NK040(thi)055:211: rgyal ba zhi khro mchod pas mnyes gyur cig /
NK040(thi)055:212: dam can rgya mtsho thugs dam bskang gyur cig /
NK040(thi)055:213: rigs drug sems can 'dod pa tshim gyur cig /
NK040(thi)055:214: dus gsum las kyi lan chags byang gyur cig /
NK040(thi)055:215: pha ma rigs drug snang srid lha 'dre rnams //
NK040(thi)055:216: rnam mkhyen rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par shog /
NK040(thi)055:217: phata phatah ces gcod kyi man ngag bsdus don gsum pa 'di ni /
NK040(thi)055:218: nyams len rgyun khyer bde ba'i phyir du tshig nyung
NK040(thi)055:219: don gsal la go bde ba nyung ngur 'di ni
NK040(thi)055:220: bya bral ba 'khrul zhig rang grol gyis sku bla
NK040(thi)055:222: 'di'i sgo nas gshin po la phan gdag pa gshed 'dul dkar nag sogs spro na'ang bya'o //
NK040(thi)055:223: zhes pa'ang de ltar 'khrul zhig chen po'i gsung las
NK040(thi)055:224: tshig gcig bcos slad med pa sor bzhag kha bskang
NK040(thi)055:225: 'os pa kahthoga rnying ma'i don gcod 'khrul med bsdus
NK040(thi)055:226: te sgyu ma'i rnal 'byor pa dri med 'od zer
NK040(thi)055:227: gyis lcags sprel hor zla gnyis pa'i tshes bcu nyin
NK040(thi)055:228: rang dang gzhan la nyer mkho'i ched du bris pa
